evidence.claim: REIN utilizes AWS cloud services for scalability and infrastructure.
The company supports FHIR standard for health data exchange.
REIN has integrated with various EHR systems including those that support X12 transaction sets.
They leverage Kafka for real-time data processing.
REIN abstracts away complexities of EDI and X12 transactions in health tech.

icp.icp_reason: Company uses X12, EDI with a focus on health tech, aligning with ICP criteria.
